UI.Custom

Class RoundedCornerBorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.border.AbstractBorder
      • UI.Custom.RoundedCornerBorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.border.Border

    public class RoundedCornerBorder
extends javax.swing.border.AbstractBorder
    This class creates a border with rounded corners.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public java.awt.Shape getBorderShape(int x,
                                     int y,
                                     int w,
                                     int h)
        Calculates the shape of the border.
        Parameters:
        x - the X coordinate of the newly constructed RoundRectangle2D
        y - the Y coordinate of the newly constructed RoundRectangle2D
        w - the width to which to set the newly constructed RoundRectangle2D
        h - the height to which to set the newly constructed RoundRectangle2D
        Returns:
        The calculated Shape of the border.
